org.sakaiproject.util

Class CalendarUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.CalendarUtil

  • public class CalendarUtil
extends Object

    CalendarUtil is a bunch of utility methods added to a java Calendar object.

      • getDay_Of_Week

        public int getDay_Of_Week(boolean useLocale)
        Get the day of the week
        Parameters:
        useLocale - return locale specific day of week e.g. SUNDAY = 1, MONDAY = 2, ... in the U.S., MONDAY = 1, TUESDAY = 2, ... in France.
        Returns:
        the day of the week.
